actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Foreign Affairs.

official_title: A concurrent resolution calling for the humane treatment and release of American prisoners of war held by North Vietnam and the National Liberation Front.

summary.text: Provides that the Congress strongly protests the treatment of United States servicemen held prisoner by North Vietnam and the National Liberation Front of South Vietnam, calls on them to comply with the requirements of the Geneva Convention, and endorses efforts by the United States Government, the United Nations, the International Red Cross, and other leaders and peoples of the world to obtain humane treatment and release of American prisoners of war.

titles.title: A concurrent resolution calling for the humane treatment and release of American prisoners of war held by North Vietnam and the National Liberation Front.
